extension.summary: EnterTain Me, Built Off of SeeHD
extension.description:
Find All the latest releases of Movies and Tv Shows in the best Qualitys Available, all content is obtained using scrapers and it is the users discretion how they choose to use this addon.
Credits :: DevKong - For Starting Me Off In Pyxbmct Jsergio - For ResolveUrl EchoCoder - For Starting Me Off On Learning Python NjmSoccer - For Introducing Me To Kodi In The First Place, And Getting Me Into The Scence
For Support Follow @Nemzzy668 On Twitter
Addon Runs A Little Slower Now Due To Site Using CloudFlare
